mapper.select: select t.*, u.name umineName, up.name uminePlaceName, s.value uminePlaceStatusTypeValue, ct.value checkTypeValue, sqt.value questionTypeValue, sqn.value questionNatureValue, rs.value reformStatusTypeValue from security_umine_place t left join unit_umine u on t.umine_id = u.id left join unit_umine_place up on t.umine_place_id = up.id left join config_umine_place_status s on t.status_id = s.id left join config_security_check_type ct on t.check_type_id = ct.id left join config_umine_place_security_question_type sqt on t.question_type_id = sqt.id left join config_umine_place_security_question_nature sqn on t.question_nature_id = sqn.id left join config_security_reform_status rs on t.reform_status_id = rs.id where t.id = #{id}
